string-array.name: charlton_string_array
string-array.item: Probably my favorite Heston movie is Planet of the Apes. Basically any time Heston is talking during the movie, its pure gold. The movie begins with an awesome monologue and ends with a great revelation at the end. The sequels are good as well, but its a different kind of good, and Heston is only in the 2nd one for a little (but amazing) bit.
